items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement a recommendation system that suggests products to users based on their browsing history, purchase history, and similar user behavior.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update in real-time as user interacts with products.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to non-personalized suggestions.
dependencies: User profile and purchase history data availability
non_functional: Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: User request was high-level; assumptions made about recommendation criteria, performance targets, and compliance requirements.
